titleStmt.title: A discourse shewing that Protestants are on the safer side, notwithstanding the uncharitable judgment of their adversaries and that their religion is the surest way to heaven.
titleStmt.author: Beaulieu, Luke, 1644 or 5-1723.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Luke Beaulieu. cf. BM.
